name: Panda Bear Simulator 3D
description:
Welcome to the world of wild animals! Today you have a chance to dip into a life of a fluffy Chinese bear – panda! Lounge about the forests, plains and have fun with Panda Bear Simulator 3D!
Be one of the funniest animals in the world, live its wonderful life by yourself and enjoy the fantastic surroundings of China’s nature! Fight for your life against cruel predators and human hunters, find and mate with females and raise little cubs! Don’t be really worry – although you’re funny, you are also a very mighty bear!
Mind that giant panda is the rarest animal in the world, so you have a very important mission to stay alive and breed! Every predator (even wolf and fox) and human hunter wants to kill you and eat! Protect your family, because your future baby panda should be safe and sound! Enjoy the life of the most popular kind of bear with Panda Bear Simulator 3D!
Don’t forget to check your hunger and health indicators – it’s a survival game, so if one of them drops, you won’t be able to stay alive anymore! Eat plants and bamboo and gather it for your little panda’s family! Chinese forest is full of carnivores, so be really attentive!
Panda Bear Simulator 3D features:
• Realistic panda bear survival simulator
• Variety of interesting missions
• An opportunity to raise up baby pandas
• Easy and intuitive controls
• Wonderful 3D graphics
Panda is so cute and nice! Everyone would love to own it as a pet! Be the most wonderful animal in the world and have fun with Panda Bear Simulator 3D!
